name: Neris
appearance: Webbed fingers scarred by coral, cropped hair, reef-tattoo behind left ear; necklace strung with legally tagged micro-pearls.
character: Brave, loyal diver who keeps her crew first; suspicious of easy coin; proud of Compact affiliation but open-eyed about its flaws.
dreams: Prove free divers can be ethical and independent
Own a stout skiff and license
secrets: Once surfaced with a ‘silent’ pearl and forgot to breathe for a count of sixty
Quietly passes tips to Brinewardens when it protects her crew
Owes Tern Quietwake a life after a trench eddy turned on her
